title: Purina Tidy Cats LightWeight, Low Dust, Clumping Cat Litter Odor Control 24/7 Performance Multi Cat Litter - 17 lb. Box
description: Choose Purina Tidy Cats LightWeight 24/7 Performance clumping cat litter to take a load off when you're pulling litter box duty. This Tidy Cats lightweight litter contains triple-odor protection to defend your home against strong smells and leaves behind a fresh, clean linen scent. The lightweight clumping litter formula weighs half as much as leading clumping cat litter, making it easy to carry. With an added Ammonia Blocker that keeps ammonia odor from forming for 14 days when used as directed, this odor control cat litter provides protection from lingering smells all day and all night. The strong, tight clumps in the scoopable litter formula also allow for convenient scooping, so litter box cleaning is simple and speedy. Our slow-release deodorizing system ensures continuous litter box odor control with absorbency and clumping in every patented granule. This Purina Tidy Cats 24/7 performance clumping cat litter features a low-dust formula for a clean and easy pour.
